artist: Artist: Utagawa Kuniteru II; Publisher: Ebiya Rinnosuke
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: framed, assembled triptych; man in black on staircase extending an offering to another man in red, seated on balcony; other figures on balcony; large gathering of men in courtyard, many with their own offerings; wall at R with large gate; blossoming tree at C
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Print (ukiyo-e)
